message.raw: Increase ROS publisher queue size from 1 to 2 for image_raw and associated camera_info topics.  This change seems to help with the observed message receipt frequency (as reported by rostopic hz) from a different machine.  Presumably having just one spot in that queue allows for relatively frequent overwriting of a message, which looks like packet loss (and thus lower observed publication rate).
